trans-unit.source: +2: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token with "{T}: Add {G}."

trans-unit.resname: CC1·1 | Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −2: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: −2: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·1 | Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −6: Draw a card for each green creature you control.
trans-unit.target: −6: Draw a card for each green creature you control.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·1 | Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME can be your commander.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·2 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omnath, Locus of Mana
trans-unit.target: Omnath, Locus of Mana

trans-unit.resname: CC1·2 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You don't lose unspent green mana as steps and phases end.
trans-unit.target: You don't lose unspent green mana as steps and phases end.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·2 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each unspent green mana you have.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each unspent green mana you have.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·2 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From the Roil emerged a ravenous primordial being of pure mana.
trans-unit.target: From the Roil emerged a ravenous primordial being of pure mana.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·3 | Bane of Progress | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bane of Progress
trans-unit.target: Bane of Progress

trans-unit.resname: CC1·3 | Bane of Progress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each permanent destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each permanent destroyed this way.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·3 | Bane of Progress | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Urza's forces tore across Argoth, and Argoth responded in kind.
trans-unit.target: Urza's forces tore across Argoth, and Argoth responded in kind.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·4 | Seedborn Muse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seedborn Muse
trans-unit.target: Seedborn Muse

trans-unit.resname: CC1·4 | Seedborn Muse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
trans-unit.target: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·4 | Seedborn Muse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The land echoes our intentions, and the kami echo the land. We must strive to live in harmony with the world even when it seems to rise against us."\n—Diary of Azusa
trans-unit.target: "The land echoes our intentions, and the kami echo the land. We must strive to live in harmony with the world even when it seems to rise against us."\n—Diary of Azusa

trans-unit.resname: CC1·5 | Sylvan Library | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sylvan Library
trans-unit.target: Sylvan Library

trans-unit.resname: CC1·5 | Sylvan Library | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

trans-unit.target: Worldly Tutor

trans-unit.resname: CC1·6 | Worldly Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·6 | Worldly Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A single chord brings them to heel. A whole song, and they dance."\n—Yisan, the wanderer bard
trans-unit.target: "A single chord brings them to heel. A whole song, and they dance."\n—Yisan, the wanderer bard
